data.actual_result: It overlaps onto the two sides and can even obstruct the offline user box
data.expected_result: the message should fit in the box and not overlap onto the background of the server invite
data.short_description: Long server names will overlap outside of the join message box when viewed on a invite
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a server with a long name  - Find a invite to said server  - Click on the invite link and observe what the join message box looks like
